verses.verse: <S%G3004><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> Rich, <S%G4145><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> A Steward, <S%G3623><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Was Accused <S%G1225><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Wasting <S%G1287><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5224><s%> , His Goods. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Called <S%G5455><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> What Is <S%G5101><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> I Hear <S%G191><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Thee? <S%G4675><s%> Render <S%G591><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Account <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3622><s%> Of Thy Stewardship; <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For Thou <S%G1063><s%> Canst Not <S%G1410><s%> Any Longer <S%G2089><s%> Be Steward. <S%G3621><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> Within <S%G1722><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Steward, <S%G3623><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall I Do, <S%G4160><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> My Lord <S%G3450><s%> Is Taking Away <S%G851><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stewardship <S%G3622><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Me? <S%G1700><s%> To Dig <S%G4626><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Am Unable; <S%G2480><s%> To Beg <S%G1871><s%> I Am Ashamed. <S%G153><s%>

I Know <S%G1097><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> I Will Do, <S%G4160><s%> That, <S%G2443><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> I Shall Have Been Removed From <S%G3179><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stewardship, <S%G3622><s%> They May Receive <S%G1209><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> Their Houses. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Calling To Him <S%G4341><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Debtors <S%G5533><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of His <S%G1438><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> First, <S%G4413><s%> How Much <S%G4214><s%> Owest Thou <S%G3784><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> To My Lord? <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> A Hundred <S%G1540><s%> Baths <S%G943><s%> Of Oil. <S%G1637><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Take <S%G1209><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Bill <S%G1121><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sitting Down <S%G2523><s%> Quickly <S%G5030><s%> Write <S%G1125><s%> Fifty. <S%G4004><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> To Another <S%G2087><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G4771><s%> And Thou <S%G1161><s%> How Much <S%G4214><s%> Owest Thou? <S%G3784><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> A Hundred <S%G1540><s%> Cors <S%G2884><s%> Of Wheat. <S%G4621><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Take <S%G1209><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Bill <S%G1121><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Write <S%G1125><s%> Eighty. <S%G3589><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Praised <S%G1867><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Steward <S%G3623><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Unrighteous <S%G93><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Prudently <S%G5430><s%> He Had Done. <S%G4160><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> Of This Age <S%G5127><s%> More Prudent <S%G5429><s%> Than <S%G5228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Generation <S%G1074><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Own <S%G1438><s%> Are. <S%G1526><s%>

And I 2504 P-1NS-C To You 5213 P-2DP Say, 3004 V-PAI-1S Make 4160 V-AAM-2P To Yourselves 1438 F-3DPM Friends 5384 A-APM By 1537 PREP The 3588 T-GSN 3126 N-GSN 3126 ARAM Mammon 3588 T-GSF Of Unrighteousness, 93 N-GSF That 2443 CONJ When 3752 CONJ, Ye Fail 1587 V-2AAS-2P They May Receive 1209 V-ADS-3P You 5209 P-2AP Into 1519 PREP The 3588 T-APF Eternal 166 A-APF Dwellings. 4633 N-APF

He That Is <S%G3588><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Least <S%G1646><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Least Is <S%G1646><s%> Unrighteous <S%G94><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Unrighteous <S%G94><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unrighteous <S%G94><s%> Mammon <S%G3126><s%> <S%G3126><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Have Not Been, <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> True <S%G228><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Will Entrust? <S%G4100><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Another's <S%G245><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Have Not Been, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Your Own <S%G5212><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Will Give? <S%G1325><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> Servant <S%G3610><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Lords <S%G2962><s%> <S%G1398><s%> To Serve, <S%G2228><s%> For Either <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> He Will Hate, <S%G3404><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> He Will Love; <S%G25><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> He Will Hold To, <S%G472><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> He Will Despise. <S%G2706><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Are Unable <S%G1410><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Serve <S%G1398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mammon. <S%G3126><s%> <S%G3126><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Heard <S%G1161><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Covetous <S%G5366><s%> Being, <S%G5225><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Derided <S%G1592><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Justify <S%G1344><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Knows <S%G1097><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts; <S%G5216><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Highly Thought Of <S%G5308><s%> An Abomination <S%G946><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets Were <S%G4396><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> John : <S%G2491><s%> From <S%G575><s%> That Time <S%G5119><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Is Announced, <S%G2097><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Forces. <S%G971><s%>

<S%G2123><s%> But Easier <S%G1161><s%> It Is For <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> To Pass Away, <S%G3928><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Tittle <S%G2762><s%> To Fail. <S%G4098><s%>

Everyone <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Puts Away <S%G630><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Marries <S%G1060><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> Commits Adultery; <S%G3431><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Her Put Away <S%G630><s%> From <S%G575><s%> A Husband <S%G435><s%> Marries <S%G1060><s%> Commits Adultery. <S%G3431><s%>

<S%G444><s%> Now A Man <S%G1161><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> Rich, <S%G4145><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Clothed In <S%G1737><s%> Purple <S%G4209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fine Linen, <S%G1040><s%> <S%G2165><s%> ' Making Good Cheer <S%G2596><s%> Daily <S%G2250><s%> In Splendour. <S%G2988><s%>

<S%G4434><s%> And A Poor Man <S%G1161><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> There Was, <S%G2258><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Was Laid <S%G906><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4440><s%> His Porch <S%G846><s%> Being Full Of Sores, <S%G1669><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Desiring <S%G1937><s%> To Be Satisfied <S%G5526><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crumbs <S%G5589><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Table <S%G5132><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Rich Man; <S%G4145><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dogs <S%G2965><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> Licked <S%G621><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1668><s%> His Sores. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poor Man, <S%G4434><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Carried Away <S%G667><s%> He <S%G846><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bosom <S%G2859><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Abraham. <S%G11><s%> <S%G599><s%> And Died <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rich Man, <S%G4145><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Buried. <S%G2290><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%> Having Lifted Up <S%G1869><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> His Eyes, <S%G846><s%> Being <S%G5225><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Torments, <S%G931><s%> He Sees <S%G3708><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G11><s%> Abraham <S%G575><s%> Afar Off, <S%G3113><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2859><s%> His Bosom. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Crying Out <S%G5455><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> Have Compassion On <S%G1653><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Send <S%G3992><s%> Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He May Dip <S%G911><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tip <S%G206><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1147><s%> Of His Finger <S%G846><s%> In Water, <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cool <S%G2711><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tongue <S%G1100><s%> My; <S%G3450><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> I Am Suffering <S%G3600><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5395><s%> This Flame. <S%G3778><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But Said <S%G1161><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> Child, <S%G5043><s%> Recollect <S%G3415><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Didst Fully Receive <S%G618><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G18><s%> Thy Good Things <S%G4675><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2222><s%> Thy Lifetime, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> Likewise <S%G3668><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2556><s%> Evil Things. <S%G3568><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G3592><s%> Is Comforted, <S%G3870><s%> <S%G4771><s%> And Thou <S%G1161><s%> Art Suffering. <S%G3600><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Besides <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> These Things, <S%G5125><s%> Between <S%G3342><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> A Chasm <S%G5490><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Has Been Fixed, <S%G4741><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Desire <S%G2309><s%> To Pass <S%G1224><s%> Hence <S%G1782><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G5209><s%> You <S%G3361><s%> Are Unable, <S%G1410><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> They <S%G3588><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Can Pass. <S%G1276><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said, <S%G1161><s%> I Beseech <S%G2065><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Thou Wouldest Send <S%G3992><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Of My Father, <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G2192><s%> For I Have <S%G1063><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Brothers, <S%G80><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> He May Earnestly Testify <S%G1263><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> May Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5117><s%> This Place <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Torment. <S%G931><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> They Have <S%G2192><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets : <S%G4396><s%> Let Them Hear <S%G191><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> No, <S%G3780><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Should Go <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> They Will Repent. <S%G3340><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> They Hear, <S%G191><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Should Rise <S%G450><s%> Will They Be Persuaded. <S%G3982><s%>
